original_title: Mawlawi and brother arrested with firearms and ammunition
original_body_lines: The Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested a Mawlawi and his brother at Oddamavadi while in possession of weapons including two firearms and several rounds of ammunition.
Police Spokesman DIG Nihal Thalduwa said the two suspects were arrested with two T-56 assault rifles, two magazines, 60 rounds of ammunition, a sword and a pair of binoculars.
